rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area leading to the central courtyard and main living spaces. Designed with a Mediterranean aesthetic using neutral tones, textured plaster walls, and natural stone accents.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Living & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A combined living room and open-plan kitchen with Mediterranean design elements. The layout promotes natural light and interaction, with a central island for dining and socializing.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open courtyard providing natural ventilation and light. Surrounded by shaded areas, it is designed for relaxation and social gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A spacious dining room adjacent to the open-plan kitchen. The design features Mediterranean style with wooden accents and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater room with soundproof walls and comfortable seating. The layout includes a projector screen and integrated surround sound, designed for optimal viewing experience.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. The design incorporates Mediterranean aesthetics with rich textiles and warm lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for joint family members. Features include ample storage and a view of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A bedroom with a serene layout and natural light. It serves as a private retreat for joint family members.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom providing privacy and comfort for family members. It features Mediterranean style finishes.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A dedicated study or guest room with versatile furniture arrangements. It can serve as a workspace for the bachelor pad.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the master bedroom. Features include tiled floors and a walk-in shower.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A guest bathroom shared between the bedrooms. Equipped with modern fixtures and essential amenities.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work or study. It is designed with a minimalist Mediterranean approach and includes ample storage.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A communal space for joint family gatherings. The room is versatile and can be used for meetings or informal relaxation.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: A storage area designed to accommodate household items and seasonal goods. The space is integrated seamlessly within the overall layout.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A functional space for laundry and other utilities. Designed to be compact yet efficient.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: A dedicated garage for vehicles. It is accessible from the exterior and integrates with the overall design.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming main entrance facing the courtyard. Designed for accessibility and natural light.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A service door leading to the garage and utility areas.

openings.name: Courtyard Balconies
openings.description: Balconies that overlook the central courtyard, providing access to outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Roof Terrace
openings.description: A roof terrace that offers panoramic views and serves as an additional relaxation space.

openings.name: House Windows
openings.description: Large windows throughout the house to promote natural light and ventilation. Designed according to Vastu principles.
